sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; class App extends React.Component{ constructor(){ super() this.state={ username:'', age:'', gender:'', hobby:['hadi','ask'] } this.changes = this.changes.bind(this) } changes = (event) => { if(event.target.type === 'checkbox'){ let value = event.target.value if(!this.state.hobby.includes(value)){ this.state.hobby.push(value) this.setState(); } else{ this.state.hobby.pop(value) this.setState(); } console.log(this.state.hobby) } else{ this.setState({[event.target.name]: event.target.value}) } } render(){ return(

Form Practice

UserName :
Age :
Gender : Male Female
Hobby : Futsal VolleyBall

Result
UserName : {this.state.username}
Age : {this.state.age}
Gender : {this.state.gender}
Hobby : {this.state.hobby.map(value=> {return value})}
) } } export default App;
